  • titan_pylib.graph.weighted_rooted_tree

titan_pylib.graph.weighted_rooted_tree のソースコード

  1from typing import List, Tuple
  2from __pypy__ import newlist_hint
  3


[ドキュメント]
  4class WeightedRootedTree():
  5
  6  def __init__(self, _G: List[List[Tuple[int, int]]], _root: int, cp: bool=False, lca: bool=False):
  7    self._n = len(_G)
  8    self._G = _G
  9    self._root = _root
 10    self._height = -1
 11    self._toposo = []
 12    self._dist = []
 13    self._descendant_num = []
 14    self._child = []
 15    self._child_num = []
 16    self._parents = []
 17    self._diameter = (-1, -1, -1)
 18    self._bipartite_graph = []
 19    self._cp = cp
 20    self._lca = lca
 21    self._rank = []
 22    K = 1
 23    while 1 << K < self._n:
 24      K += 1
 25    self._K = K
 26    self._doubling = [[-1]*self._n for _ in range(self._K)]
 27    self._calc_dist_toposo()
 28    if cp:
 29      self._calc_child_parents()
 30    if lca:
 31      self._calc_doubling()
 32
 33  def __str__(self):
 34    self._calc_child_parents()
 35    ret = ["<WeightedRootedTree> ["]
 36    ret.extend(
 37        [f'  dist:{str(d).zfill(2)} - v:{str(i).zfill(2)} - p:{str(self._parents[i]).zfill(2)} - child:{sorted(self._child[i])}'
 38         for i, d in sorted(enumerate(self._dist), key=lambda x: x[1])]
 39    )
 40    ret.append(']')
 41    return '\n'.join(ret)
 42
 43  def _calc_dist_toposo(self) -> None:
 44    '''Calc dist and toposo. / O(N)'''
 45    # initメソッドで直接実行
 46    _G, _root = self._G, self._root
 47    _dist = [-1] * self._n
 48    _rank = [-1] * self._n
 49    _dist[_root] = 0
 50    _rank[_root] = 0
 51    _toposo = newlist_hint(self._n)
 52    _toposo.append(_root)
 53    todo = [_root]
 54    while todo:
 55      v = todo.pop()
 56      d = _dist[v]
 57      r = _rank[v]
 58      for x, c in _G[v]:
 59        if _dist[x] != -1:
 60          continue
 61        _dist[x] = d + c
 62        _rank[x] = r + 1
 63        todo.append(x)
 64        _toposo.append(x)
 65    self._dist = _dist
 66    self._rank = _rank
 67    self._toposo = _toposo
 68
 69  def _calc_child_parents(self) -> None:
 70    '''Calc child and parents. / O(N)'''
 71    if self._child and self._child_num and self._parents:
 72      return
 73    _G, _rank = self._G, self._rank
 74    _child_num = [0] * self._n
 75    _child = [[] for _ in range(self._n)]
 76    _parents = [-1] * self._n
 77    for v in self._toposo[::-1]:
 78      for x, _ in _G[v]:
 79        if _rank[x] < _rank[v]:
 80          _parents[v] = x
 81          continue
 82        _child[v].append(x)
 83        _child_num[v] += 1
 84    self._child_num = _child_num
 85    self._child = _child
 86    self._parents = _parents
 87
 88  '''Return dist from root. / O(N)'''


[ドキュメント]
 89  def get_dists(self) -> List[int]:
 90    return self._dist


 91
 92  '''Return toposo. / O(N)'''


[ドキュメント]
 93  def get_toposo(self) -> List[int]:
 94    return self._toposo


 95
 96  '''Return height. / O(N)'''


[ドキュメント]
 97  def get_height(self) -> int:
 98    if self._height > -1:
 99      return self._height
100    self._height = max(self._dist)
101    return self._height


102
103  '''Return descendant_num. / O(N)'''


[ドキュメント]
104  def get_descendant_num(self) -> List[int]:
105    if self._descendant_num:
106      return self._descendant_num
107    _G, _dist = self._G, self._dist
108    _descendant_num = [1] * self._n
109    for v in self._toposo[::-1]:
110      for x, _ in _G[v]:
111        if _dist[x] < _dist[v]:
112          continue
113        _descendant_num[v] += _descendant_num[x]
114    for i in range(self._n):
115      _descendant_num[i] -= 1
116    self._descendant_num = _descendant_num
117    return self._descendant_num


118
119  '''Return child / O(N)'''


[ドキュメント]
120  def get_child(self) -> List[List[int]]:
121    if self._child:
122      return self._child
123    self._calc_child_parents()
124    return self._child


125
126  '''Return child_num. / O(N)'''


[ドキュメント]
127  def get_child_num(self) -> List[int]:
128    if self._child_num:
129      return self._child_num
130    self._calc_child_parents()
131    return self._child_num


132
133  '''Return parents. / O(N)'''


[ドキュメント]
134  def get_parents(self) -> List[int]:
135    if self._parents:
136      return self._parents
137    self._calc_child_parents()
138    return self._parents


139
140  '''Return diameter of tree. (diameter, start, stop) / O(N)'''


[ドキュメント]
141  def get_diameter(self) -> Tuple[int, int, int]:
142    if self._diameter[0] > -1:
143      return self._diameter
144    s = self._dist.index(self.get_height())
145    todo = [s]
146    ndist = [-1] * self._n
147    ndist[s] = 0
148    while todo:
149      v = todo.pop()
150      d = ndist[v]
151      for x, c in self._G[v]:
152        if ndist[x] != -1:
153          continue
154        ndist[x] = d + c
155        todo.append(x)
156    diameter = max(ndist)
157    t = ndist.index(diameter)
158    self._diameter = (diameter, s, t)
159    return self._diameter


160
161  '''Return [1 if root else 0]. / O(N)'''


[ドキュメント]
162  def get_bipartite_graph(self) -> List[int]:
163    if self._bipartite_graph:
164      return self._bipartite_graph
165    self._bipartite_graph = [-1] * self._n
166    _bipartite_graph = self._bipartite_graph
167    _bipartite_graph[self._root] = 1
168    todo = [self._root]
169    while todo:
170      v = todo.pop()
171      nc = 0 if _bipartite_graph[v] else 1
172      for x, _ in self._G[v]:
173        if _bipartite_graph[x] != -1:
174          continue
175        _bipartite_graph[x] = nc
176        todo.append(x)
177    return _bipartite_graph


178
179  def _calc_doubling(self) -> None:
180    "Calc doubling if self._lca. / O(NlogN)"
181    if not self._parents:
182      self._calc_child_parents()
183    for i in range(self._n):
184      self._doubling[0][i] = self._parents[i]
185    for k in range(self._K-1):
186      for v in range(self._n):
187        if self._doubling[k][v] < 0:
188          self._doubling[k+1][v] = -1
189        else:
190          self._doubling[k+1][v] = self._doubling[k][self._doubling[k][v]]
191
192  '''Return LCA of (u, v). / O(logN)'''


[ドキュメント]
193  def get_lca(self, u: int, v: int) -> int:
194    assert self._lca, f'{self.__class__.__name__}.get_lca(), `lca` must be True'
195    _doubling, _rank = self._doubling, self._rank
196    if _rank[u] < _rank[v]:
197      u, v = v, u
198    _r = _rank[u] - _rank[v]
199    for k in range(self._K):
200      if _r >> k & 1:
201        u = _doubling[k][u]
202    if u == v:
203      return u
204    for k in range(self._K-1, -1, -1):
205      if _doubling[k][u] != _doubling[k][v]:
206        u = _doubling[k][u]
207        v = _doubling[k][v]
208    return _doubling[0][u]


209
210  '''Return dist(u -- v). / O(logN)'''


[ドキュメント]
211  def get_dist(self, u: int, v: int) -> int:
212    return self._dist[u] + self._dist[v] - 2*self._dist[self.get_lca(u, v)]


213
214  '''Return True if (a is on path(u - v)) else False. / O(logN)'''


[ドキュメント]
215  def is_on_path(self, u: int, v: int, a: int) -> bool:
216    return self.get_dist(u, a) + self.get_dist(a, v) == self.get_dist(u, v)  # rank??


217
218  '''Return path (u -> v). / O(logN + |path|)'''


[ドキュメント]
219  def get_path(self, u: int, v: int) -> List[int]:
220    assert self._lca, f'{self.__class__.__name__}, `lca` must be True'
221    if u == v: return [u]
222    self.get_parents()
223    def get_path_lca(u: int, v: int) -> List[int]:
224      path = []
225      while u != v:
226        u = self._parents[u]
227        if u == v:
228          break
229        path.append(u)
230      return path
231    lca = self.get_lca(u, v)
232    path = [u]
233    path.extend(get_path_lca(u, lca))
234    if u != lca and v != lca:
235      path.append(lca)
236    path.extend(get_path_lca(v, lca)[::-1])
237    path.append(v)
238    return path


239


[ドキュメント]
240  def dfs_in_out(self) -> Tuple[List[int], List[int]]:
241    curtime = -1
242    todo = [~self._root, self._root]
243    intime = [-1] * self._n
244    outtime = [-1] * self._n
245    seen = [False] * self._n
246    seen[self._root] = True
247    while todo:
248      curtime += 1
249      v = todo.pop()
250      if v >= 0:
251        intime[v] = curtime
252        for x, _ in self._G[v]:
253          if not seen[x]:
254            todo.append(~x)
255            todo.append(x)
256            seen[x] = True
257      else:
258        outtime[~v] = curtime
259    return intime, outtime
